properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_GENDER, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') ENROLL_DT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ? AND UNREGISTER_FL = 'N'
SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_GENDER FROM MEMBER WHERE UNREGISTER_FL = 'N'
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_NM = ?, MEMBER_GENDER = ? WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PW = ? WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET UNREGISTER_FL = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND SECURITY_CODE = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ?
